thread.title: Styx fan is suing drummer after being hit by drumstick | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Styx fan is suing drummer after being hit by drumstick | Daily Mail Online

author: Emily Crane For Dailymail.Com
title: Styx fan is suing drummer after being hit by drumstick | Daily Mail Online
text: Styx fan sues the drummer for 'leaving her bloodied and scarred' after she took a drumstick to the face during an Atlanta concert Lori Frederick filed a lawsuit in Georgia against Styx drummer Todd Sucherman She claims to have been injured by a drumstick at Atlanta concert in June 2015 Lawsuit accuses Sucherman of negligently throwing the drumstick into crowd Frederick claims she was struck in face and suffered bodily scarring from injuries She is seeking damages for her medical expenses and loss of income Published: 15:24 GMT, 1 February 2017 | Updated: 18:24 GMT, 1 February 2017 311 shares
